TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LiteralControl extends System.Web.UI.Control implements class System.Web.UI.ITextControl
Public Class LiteralControl Inherits Control Implements ITextControl
public ref class LiteralControl : System::Web::UI::Control, System::Web::UI::ITextControl
type LiteralControl = class inherit Control interface ITextControl

summary.span: 表示不需要在伺服器上處理之 ASP.NET 網頁中的 HTML 項目、文字和任何其他字串。

span.span: Represents HTML elements, text, and any other strings in an ASP.NET page that do not require processing on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有 HTML 項目和可讀取的文字，並不需要此類別的執行個體的伺服器端處理，ASP.NET 會都編譯。ASP.NET compiles all HTML elements and readable text that do not require server-side processing into instances of this class. 比方說，不包含 HTML 項目`runat="server"`其項目的開頭標記中的屬性/值組會編譯成物件。For example, an HTML element that does not contain a `runat="server"` attribute/value pair in its opening tag is compiled into a object. 物件不會維護檢視狀態，因此內容必須重新建立每個要求的物件。 objects do not maintain view state, so the contents of a object must be recreated on each request. 常值控制項做文字預留位置，表示您可以用來從常值控制項擷取文字，然後移除父伺服器控制項的常值控制項透過在父系的集合屬性。Literal controls behave as text holders, meaning that you can extract text from the literal control and remove the literal control from the parent server control's collection through the parent's property. 因此，當您開發自訂控制項衍生自類別中，請確定您的控制項執行任何必要的前置處理步驟本身，而不使用呼叫來完成這些工作的方法。Therefore, when you develop a custom control derived from the class, make sure your control performs any required preprocessing steps itself, rather than using a call to the method to accomplish them. 一般而言，您會這樣做可以改善您的 Web 應用程式的回應時間。Typically, you would do this to improve the response time of your Web application. 您可以新增或移除頁面或伺服器控制項，以程式設計方式使用的常值控制項或方法，分別。You can add or remove literal controls from a page or server control programmatically using the or the method, respectively. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用多載建構函式覆寫時方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the overloaded constructor when overriding the method. 程式碼會加入兩個新物件和Web 伺服器控制項目前的伺服器控制項，屬性。The code adds two new objects and a Web server control to the current server control's property. [!code-csharp[SystemWebUILiteralControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUILiteralControl/CS/controlcreatechildcontrols.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SystemWebUILiteralControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUILiteralControl/VB/controlcreatechildcontrols.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，其包含要呈現在要求的 ASP.NET 網頁上的常值字串。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that contains a literal string to be rendered on the requested ASP.NET page.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立類別， `CustLiteralControlClass`，這段類別。The following code example creates a class, `CustLiteralControlClass`, that extends the class. 它會建立名為類別的執行個體`myLiteralControlClass1`使用建構函式未指定的文字物件。It creates an instance of the class named `myLiteralControlClass1` by using the constructor that does not specify the text of the object. 建立物件之後，屬性用來設定它所包含的文字。After the object is created, the property is used to set the text that it contains. [!code-csharp[LiteralControlSample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LiteralControlSample/CS/customliteralcontrol.cs.aspx#4)] [!code-vb[LiteralControlSample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LiteralControlSample/VB/customliteralcontrol.vb.aspx#4)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立兩個執行個體類別使用建構函式。The following code example creates two instances of the class using the constructor. 兩個執行個體轉譯 H3 HTML 項目的開頭和結尾標記，並包含要顯示在 H3 標記內的文字。The two instances render opening and closing tags for an H3 HTML element, and include the text to display within the H3 tags. summary.span: 為 類別的目前執行個體，建立 物件。

span.span: Creates an object for the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，物件只包含文字和任何子伺服器控制項。By default, objects contain only text and no child server controls. 如果您想要變更此行為，您必須覆寫這個方法。If you want to change this behavior, you must override this method. ## Examples 下列程式碼會覆寫方法用來建立的執行個體類別，而非執行個體類別。The following code example overrides the method to create an instance of the class rather than an instance of the class. span.span: Writes the content of the object to the ASP.NET page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立自訂的伺服器，控制而且想来呈現給用戶端的特定的 HTML 或文字時，您可以傳遞的值來改善效能的控制項屬性，以方法，而不是呼叫方法。When you create a custom server control and want to render specific HTML or text to a client, you can improve the performance of the control by passing the value of the property to the method rather than calling the method.
